content.rendered:
Directed by Radha Krishna Jagarlamudi

Written by Radha Krishna Jagarlamudi. Sai Madhav Burra

Cast Nandamuri Balakrishna (Nandamuri Taraka Ramarao). Vidya Balan (Nandamuri Basava Tarakam). Kaikala Satyanarayana (H.M. Reddy). Nandamuri Kalyan Ram (Nandamuri Harikrishna (as Nandamuri Kalyanram)). Rana Daggubati (Nara Chandrababu Naidu). Sumanth (Akkineni Nageswara Rao (as Sumanth Kumar)). Brahmanandam (Relangi Venkatramaiah). Prakash Raj (Nagireddy). Nassar (Bhavanam Venkatram Reddy). S.V. Krishna Reddy (Kamalakara Kameswararao). Subhalekha Sudhakar (P. Pullaiah). Jisshu Sengupta (L.V. Prasad (as Jishu Sengupta)). Sachin Khedekar (Nadendla Bhaskar Rao). V.K. Naresh (B.A. Subba Rao). Murali Sharma (Chakrapani (as Murli Sharma)). Radha Krishna Jagarlamudi (K.V. Reddy (as Krish Jagarlamudi)). Chandra Siddhartha (Dasari Narayana Rao). Bharath Reddy (Daggubati Venkateswara Rao). Prakash Kovelamudi (K. Raghavendra Rao). Vennela Kishore (Rukmangada Rao). Daggubati Raja (Trivikrama Rao). Bhanuchander (DGP). Nithya Menen (Savitri (as Nithya Menon)). Pranitha (Krishna Kumari). Devayani (Annapurnamma). Shriya Saran (Prabha). Payal Rajput (Jayasudha). Srinivas Avasarala (D.V. Narasaraju). Hansika Motwani (Jayaprada). Rakul Preet Singh (Sridevi). Poonam Bajwa (Lokeswari). Himansi (Purandareswari (as Himansi Katragadda)). Manjima Mohan (Bhuvaneshwari). Hiroshini Komali (Umamaheswari). Srinivas Garapati (Sai Krishna (as Srinivas)). Kasi Vishwanath (Registrar (as Kasi Viswanath)). Padmini (Diviseema Woman). Bindu Chandramouli (Lakshmi Bai). Sairam Chowdary (Lakshmaiah Chowdary). Sudha Belawadi (Venkatravamma). Ravi Prakash (Yoganand). Nagaraju (Expectant). Somesh (M.A. Rehman). Keshav Deepak (Chittoor Nagaiah). Inturi Vasu (Tatineni Prakash Rao (as Vasu Inturi)). Emani Srinivasa Rao (Gumastha (as Srinivas Emani)). Surabhi Jayachandra (T.V. Raju (as Surabhi Jayachandra Varma)). Venugopal (Distributor). Bhadram (Peketi Sivaram). Swarna (Pregnant Woman on train). Shalini Pandey (Shavukaru Janaki). Jaya Naidu (Santha Kumari). Sanjay Reddy (Pingali). Eshwar Babu (S.V. Ranga Rao) . Sridhar Akkineni (Kranthi Kumar). Akshara (Lokeshwari). Anthony (Farmer #1). Darbha Appaji Ambarisha (MLA #1 (as Appaji)). Arjuna (Marcus Bartley (as Arjuna Prasad)). Nalluri Ashok Babu (Bus Conductor). R. Balakrishna (Dushyashanudu). Ravi Bandaru (Jalagam Vengal Rao). Master Bhanu (Boy). Rohit Bharadwaj (Ramakrishna). Mandali Buddhaprasad (Mandali Venkat Krishnarao). Narasimha Burra (Bhoothala Raju). Sai Madhav Burra (Peetambaram). Kiriti Dharmaraju (Chinna Swamiji). Geethanjali (Nirmalamma). Giridhar (NTR Manager). Vajja Venkata Giridhar (Janardhan). Girish (Ramoji Rao). Prasad Gogineni (Tahsildar). Kumar Gola (Zakir Hussain). Hari (Inspector). Harika (Bhavanam Jayapradha). Sree Harsha (Baaludu). Hema (Daughter). Sv Hemamalini (Gandhari). Ikshvak (Jayakrishna). R. Jayanand (Nakuludu). Jvr (MLA #3). Kamesh (Yandamuri Jogarao). Kireeti (Chinnaswamiji (as Kireeti Damaraju)). Ravi Kishan (Ravikant Nagaich). Kishore (Diviseema Victim #1). R. Kodandaram (Dharmaraju). Kruthi (Purandareshwari). Ramana Kumar (Ashwaddhama). Suresh Kumar (P V Narasimha Rao). Lakshminarayana (Kantha Rao). Madhav (Dana Veera Shoora Karna Editor). Surabhi Meenakshamma (Old Lady). Nalini Mohan (Krishnacharyudu). Murali (Edu Kondalu). Muralidhar (Tanguturi Anjayya). Nagaraju (Chalameshwar). Nagarani (Kunthi). Nageshwara Rao (Pundarikakshaiah). Niharika (Purandareshwari). Kishore Kumar Polimera (Village Man). Bhanu Prakash (Village Kid). Devi Prasad (Gummadi). Sa Jayaram Prasad (Bhimudu). Pratap (MLA #2). Pravallika (Madhumani). Praveen (Vallabhajosyula Shivaram). Master Raghu (Salim Master). Viswa Raghu (Saleem Master). Gopal Rao (K C Abraham). Koteshwara Rao (Arjun Raju). Krishna Rao (Diviseema Victim #2). Mallikarjuna Rao (Dhoolipala). Rama Rao (S Venkatratnam). Vasanth Rao (Bhishmudu). Vasudeva Rao (Dronacharyudu). Venkatesh Rao (Ramakrishna Matam Swamiji). Vinayaka Rao (Reporter). Mk Reddy (Farmer #2). Suneel Kumar Reddy (Kannappa). Sveeyan Reddy (Sai Krishna). R. Rojanand (Sahadevudu). Sana (Rajeshwari).Ramajogayya Sastry. Pravara Sai Sathyanarayana (Head of the Village). Siva Satyanarayana (CNR). Nimmala Shankar (Vithalacharya). Mv Shastri (Doctor). Shiva (Art Director). Shivashankar (Vempati China Satyam). Sa Shivshankar (Vidhurudu). Shritej (Y S Rajashekara Reddy). Sikindar (MGR). Singh (S Krishna Rao)

Languages Telugu. Hindi

Producers Nandamuri Balakrishna. Nandamuri Vasundhara Devi. Vishnuvardhan Induri. Sai Korrapati. M.R.V. Prasad

Production Legend3. NBK Film. Vaarahi Chalana Chitra
